0.name: Einstein
0.effect_1: QTE/3 orb skills decreases target's element resistance by 15% for 8 seconds, (Meaning: if a fire attack hits the target, it decreases fire resistance, if lightning, it decreases lightning resistance. Physical does not work with this memory) CD: 10s
0.effect_2: When damaged, open an elemental ring and increase your elemental resistance by 5% + 1% of your current element resistance for 5s. The ring grants an increase of element damage by 15%, CD : 8s

1.name: Condelina
1.effect_2: Basic attacks has a 25% chance to trigger Berserk Mode. During Berserk Mode, Increase basic attack damage by 15% and critical chance by 5%. Lasts for 5s, CD: 8s

2.name: Shakespeare
2.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% and fire damage by 7%
2.effect_2: Each attack has a 50% chance to inflict Burn to the enemy for 5s. Attacking Burned enemies has a 20% chance to trigger an explosion, dealing 100% fire damage, CD: 5s. Burned enemies have -8% fire resistance and take 12% fire damage every second. Stackable up to 3 times. Burn duration resets after each stack.

3.name: Heisen
3.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% and lightning damage by 7%
3.effect_2: Each attack has a 25% chance of triggering a 3.5m radius lightning explosion. The explosion deals 100% damage and inflict Electrify for 5s to enemies caught in it, CD: 5s. Electrify decreases enemy's lightning resistance by 8%. Attacking Electrified enemies have a 20% chance of triggering Lightning Chain that causes 250% to all enemies inflicted with Electrify, CD: 8s.

4.name: Darwin
4.effect_1: Increase all damage by 3% for every orb consumed, lasts for 4s, up to 5 stacks, duration can be renewed
4.effect_2: When consuming an orb, the orb's corresponding color is stored. When 3 colors are collected, release a 12m radius shockwave with the character as the center that deals 600% physical damage, stored colors reset after shockwave

5.name: Hannah
5.effect_2: Every 30s, the next 3 orb skill will trigger slowmo. Character will gain 1 random orb

6.name: Adolf
6.effect_1: Gain 20% more energy when consuming orbs. Ultimate takes 20% less energy to activate
6.effect_2: Upon activating ultimate, all damage is increased by 15% for 10s, duration can be renewed. When ultimate is over, gain Super Armor and reduce incoming damage by 20% for 5s, duration can be renewed

7.name: Da Vinci
7.effect_1: When QTE is triggered, the player-controlled character will gain 10% attack and 20% defense for 8s, duration can be renewed
7.effect_2: Triggering QTE will also trigger the QTE of the other character, CD: 8s. When all 3 characters are on the field at once, increase attack by 20%

8.name: Katherine
8.effect_1: QTE/3 orb skills will decrease the target's physical defense by 20% for 8 seconds, CD: 10s
8.effect_2: When damaged is received, gain a shield equal to 20% of your defense, and gain a 15% increase to physical damage for 5s, CD: 8s

9.name: Ferret II
9.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 10%. Heals increase the target's physical damage and defense by 10% for 5s, CD: 8s
9.effect_2: Everytime you cast a healing skill, drone receives one charge. When the drone is fully charged, the next heal will summon a healing drone. The drone will automatically follow the character with the least amout of health on the field, healing 2% of the character's maximum health every second in a 5m radius. The area will also increase physical damage by 15% for 5s. One drone can be deployed every 12s

10.name: Guinea
10.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 10%. Heals increases target's elemental damage and resistance by 10% for 5s, CD: 8s
10.effect_2: Everytime you cast a heal skill, drone receives one charge. When the drone is fully charged, the next heal will summon an elemental drone. The drone will automatically follow the lowest health character on the field healing 2% of the character's maximum health every second in a 5m radius. The area will also increase elemental damage by 15% for 5s. One drone can be deployed every 12s

11.name: Frederick
11.effect_1: Dodging increases movement speed by 15% and all damage by 5%, up to 3 stacks, duration can be renewed
11.effect_2: Dodging reduces the attacking opponent's speed by 20% and receives 15% more damage, lasts for 4s, CD: 8s

12.name: Patton
12.effect_1: Increase critical chance and physical damage by 5%
12.effect_2: For every non-critical hit dealt, the next physical attack's critical chance increases by 2%, stackable up to 20%. Critical chance is reset once a critical hit has been landed. Physical damage is increased by 5% for 3s whenever you land a critical hit, stackable up to 3 times, duration can be renewed

13.name: Erwin
13.effect_2: Increase basic attack's damage by 15%. Buff disappears when attacked, returns after 12s

14.name: Eiffu
14.effect_1: Increase all damage by 2% for every orb consumed, lasts for 3s. 5 stacks max, duration can be renewed
14.effect_2: Every 60s, the next 3 orb skill will trigger slowmo

15.name: Ekko
15.effect_1: Increase all damage by 2% and elemental damage 4%
15.effect_2: There's a 15% chance to Burn, Shock, Freeze, and Corrode(depending on the element). Lasts for 5s with a cooldown of 8s on each enemy

16.name: Voltaire
16.effect_1: Attacks decrease enemy's defense by 10% for 5s, CD: 12s
16.effect_2: Decrease target's physical defense by 15% when damage is taken, lasts for 7s. Stackable up to 2 times, duration can be renewed

17.name: Groda
17.effect_1: Attacks decrease enemy's resistance by 6% for 5s, CD: 12s
17.effect_2: Enemies within 5m has 6% lower elemental resistance when damage is taken, lasts for 7s, duration can be renewed

18.name: Richelieu
18.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 5%. Heals increase target's physical damage by 8% for 4s, CD: 5s
18.effect_2: Gain a random orb for every 8 orbs consumed, CD: 5s

19.name: Samanda
19.effect_1: Increase healing effectiveness by 5%. Heals increase target's elemental damage by 8% for 4s, CD: 5s
19.effect_2: Heals will leave an elemental ring. Increase elemental damage by 8% and elemental resistance by 5%, CD: 10s

20.name: Mozart
20.effect_1: Increase all damage by 15% when in slowmo
20.effect_2: Deal 200% damage to all enemies on screen when slowmo is triggered

21.name: Liv-Reindeer
21.effect_1: Increase orbs' damage and healing effectiveness by 5%
21.effect_2: There's a 20% chance of dropping a christmas present near an enemy when attacking. Picking up the box will recover 5 energy and increase all damage by 5%, CD: 10s

22.name: New Year's Firework
22.effect_1: Attack increases by 5%. After consuming 3 red orbs, summon 4 rings of red packets. The red packets will deal 10% fire damage when they come in contact with the enemy, lasts for 10 seconds, 30 seconds cooldown

23.name: Lantern Gathering
23.effect_1: After using a 3 orb combo or QTE, summon a lantern that follows all allies on the field for 15 seconds. The lantern buffs nearby allies, increasing their attack and movement speed by 7%. This effect has a 30 seconds cooldown

24.name: Basilone
24.effect_1: 3% increase to all attacks, 7% increase to dark damage
24.effect_2: When dealing damage, there is a 20% chance to summon a phantom area for 5 seconds, CD: 5s. Enemies standing within the phantom area are inflicted with corrosion for 3 seconds. Enemies afflicted with corrosion take 80% dark damage every 2 seconds and have 8% reduced dark resistance. When attacking enemies with corrosion there is a 20% chance to gain 1 random orb. This effect has a 12 seconds cooldown

25.name: Zuwen
25.effect_1: 3% increase to all attacks, 7% increase to ice damage
25.effect_2:
When attacking, there is a 30% chance of inflicting frost, lasts for 5 seconds. When attacking frosted enemies, there is a 20% chance of triggering an ice burst, dealing 420% ice damage and applying freeze to enemies within 3m radius, 8 seconds cooldown.
Frost: decreases 20% of target's movement speed and 8% ice resistance.

26.name: Koya
26.effect_2: Gain 20% ultimate energy for every entrance to stage. Skill orbs deal 10% more damage when a shield is active.
26.effect_3:
When Camu is in Berserker mode, gain 10% additional damage and 20% movement speed. Skill orbs will now inflict Terror. The Terror effect lasts until Berserker mode is over.
Terror: decrease target's attack by 10% and deal 10% additional damage to the target

27.name: Leeuwenhoek
27.effect_2: Additional 20% defense reduction for Spear of Insight. Deal 5% more damage to targets that has been inflicted with Spear of Insight.

28.name: Anjun
28.effect_1: 5% additional damage increase to normal attacks. 7% physical damage increase.
28.effect_2: Blue orb's anti-CC buff lasts for an additional 2 seconds. Gain 15% physical damage when the buff is present.
28.effect_3: Gain 24 energy when you enter Condensed Will state. Gain 3 color orbs, one of each after releasing ultimate.

29.name: KFC・Alpha
29.effect_1: QTE, 3 orb combos has a 50% chance of dropping a family bucket, 30 seconds cooldown. The family bucket will stay on stage for 10 seconds and characters who picks it up gains 12% movement speed, lasts for 15 seconds. Picking the bucket up again will refresh the duration.

30.name: KFC・Lucia
30.effect_1: QTE, 3 orb combos has a 50% chance of dropping a chicken burger, 30 seconds cooldown. The chicken burger lasts on stage for 10 seconds and characters who picks it up gains 8 energy.

31.name: Flamel
31.effect_2: After entering Annihilation mode, increase dark damage and ultimate damage by 30%. Gain 10 energy after consuming an Annihilation Orb.

32.name: Lucrezia
32.effect_2: When **Chord** is triggered, gain an additional 15 Ultimate Energy and 10% Additional Damage Increase, lasts 5 seconds.
32.effect_3: 20% Additional Damage to target affected by **Concerto** {self}
